alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Logan; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 12:01AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Logan, south central Johnson, north central Yell and central Pope Counties through 1245 AM CST... At 1200 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Dardanelle, or 11 miles west of Russellville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Dardanelle... Dover... London... Knoxville... Hector... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Lake Dardanelle... Broomfield... Taral... Mt Nebo State Park... Appleton... Augsburg... Ludwig... Piney Bay Recreation Area... Delaware... Pleasant Valley in Pope County... Gum Log... Economy... Caglesville... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 67 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for western and central Arkansas.
